name: AmazonianNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is for Amazon employees to hear the latest news such as product launches, Amazon Studios’ releases, company events, and more.

After enabling the Amazonian News skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing.
